original_text: And therewith he made the sockets to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and the brasen altar, and the brasen grate for it, and all the vessels of the altar,
korean_text: 이것으로 회막 문 기둥 받침과 놋 제단과 놋 그물과 제단의 모든 기구를 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: And therewith he made the sockets
to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
and the brasen grate for it
and all the vessels of the altar
